name: Benjamin Nightsinger
effect: Shootout: +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the Shootout if there is a Terror in the opposing posse. Benjamin can do this once in every shootout he is in.

name: Bounty Hunter
effect: Noon: A Bounty Hunter (dude) with a two stud Bullet Rating and zero Influence, calls out one Wanted dude in play who cannot refuse. The Bounty Hunter is under your control. After the shootout, the Bounty Hunter is removed from play.

name: Bow and Arrow
effect: Weapon. May only be attached to a Sioux. Shootout Pull: Boot this dude and the Bow and Arrow. Target an opposing dude. If the Pull is greater than the target's value plus his Bullet Rating, then ace the target.

name: Calming Spirits
effect: Noon Spirit X: The difficulty of this Spirit is equal to the current Fear Level plus the number of Terrors in play. If the Spirit is successful, the Fear Level is reduced by one and this Spirit is sent to your discard pile.

name: Corporeal Twist
effect: Shootout Hex 5: If the Hex is successful, one opposing dude has his Bullets reduced by two for this Shootout. Shootout Hex 9: If the Hex is successful, one opposing dude has his Bullets reduced to zero for this Shootout.

name: Crazy Quilt
effect: Huckster:3

name: Curse
effect: Noon Spirit 6: If the Spirit is successful, one dude in play has a -1 Bullet and -1 Influence penalty until after nightfall. Noon Spirit 10: If the Spirit is successful, one dude in play has a -2 Bullet and -2 Influence penalty until after nightfall.

name: Danny Hamilton
effect: Noon: Move Hamilton to any location that has an Abomination in it. This does not boot Hamilton.

name: Deadland
effect: Public. Non-Unique. Bring into play for free if the Fear Level is 6 or higher. Subsequent Deadlands must have 1 higher Fear Level to be played. Controller Reaction: Boot when you are bringing a Terror into play to produce 5 ghost rock.

name: Double Time
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes at a deed. The deed your dude is in has its ghost rock production doubled during the next upkeep phase.

name: Elizabeth King
effect: Reaction: Boot Elizabeth to reduce by 2 ghost rock the cost of a non-terror drifter you are about to bring into play.

name: Feather-In-His-Hair
effect: Non-Unique.

name: Fish Ridge Mine
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Harold Longfellow
effect: Non-Unique.

name: Hat Gun
effect: Shootout: Attach this card as a goods card to your Mad Scientist in this shootout. This card acts as a goods card and is a +1 Bullet weapon Gadget (with no difficulty).

name: Hot Lead Flyin'
effect: Reaction Pull: Play immediately after hands are revealed in a Shootout. For each dude the losing posse has with a value higher than the pull, the winner must ace a dude in his posse as if he had lost the round.

name: Human Shield
effect: Shootout: One of your dudes in this Shootout becomes Wanted. This dude cannot be aced in this round of the Shootout. Continue the Shootout if necessary.

name: Ian Spencer-Whitney
effect: Shootout: Gains a +3 Bullet bonus, but cannot use (or have used) any weapons in this shootout. Ian may only use this ability if there are one or more Terrors in the opposing posse.

name: Icehouse
effect: Private. Controller. Reaction: Boot immediately after a dude is aced to put him on ice instead of burying him (this aces any dude currently in the Icehouse). This dude is dead but not at Boot Hill, and only the controller of the Icehouse can target this dude.

name: John Bloody Knife
effect: Shootout: Replace Joseph Eyes-Like-Rain in a posse that John is not in. Joseph goes to your home, booted.

name: Joseph Eyes-Like-Rain
effect: Shaman:4 Reaction: Boot Joseph when you have just discarded a Draw Hand. Take any one card from the Draw Hand and place it in your Play Hand. Discard a card if you have more than five.

name: Labor Dispute
effect: Strikes produce two less ghost rock this turn.

name: Lawrence Goodman
effect: Noon: One of your other dudes at a different location begins a job at the deed Goodman is in. If the job is successful and this deed is in town, take ghost rock from the deed's owner equal to the Bullet Rating of the dude performing the deed.

name: Lightning Strike
effect: Shootout Spirit X: The difficulty of this Spirit is an opposing Dude's value plus Bullets. If this Spirit is successful, the target is booted and sent home. If the Spirit is successful by more than 5 points, the target is aced as well. If you pull an ace or Joker, the Shaman is also aced.

name: Little Running Bear
effect: Shaman:0 Shootout: When in a Shootout against a Terror, raise Bear's Bullet Rating to be equal to the lowest Bullet Rating among opposing Terrors.

name: Medicine
effect: Reaction Spirit X: Boot this shaman when a dude is aced. The difficulty of this Spirit is equal to the dude's value plus Influence plus Bullets. If the Spirit is successful, the dude is not aced, but is moved home booted.

name: Miss Coutreau's
effect: Private.

name: New Science Magazine
effect: The new issue arrived! Get any one Gadget from your deck, show it to the other players, and add it to your hand. Take any one card from your hand and shuffle it back into your deck.

name: On the Side Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Pembroke's Analysis of Hoyle
effect: Unique. Mystical. Play only on a Huckster. This Huckster has his Huckster level increased by 2. Reaction: When this dude's opponent in a Shootout reveals an illegal Draw Hand, target one dude in the opposing posse who is aced immediately, before the results of the Shootout are determined.

name: Reserves
effect: Noon: Gain 1 ghost rock.

name: Rumors
effect: Noon: One dude has his Influence reduced by one while he is at any location except at home. The dude's Influence is returned to normal after nightfall.

name: Shadow Man
effect: Noon Hex 5: If this Hex is successful, this Huckster cannot be targeted by other players' actions until after nightfall.

name: Singing Feather
effect: Shaman:0 Reaction: Boot Singing Feather to cancel any action about to be taken by a Harrowed dude.

name: Sioux Union
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:18 Reaction: Instead of receiving your home's production during upkeep, you may get any one Spirit or Sioux dude from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand.

name: Snakebite
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand during a Shootout. Ace one dude in his posse. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a Player per draw.

name: Strength of the bear
effect: Shootout Spirit 4: If this Spirit is successful, target one of your dudes in this Shootout who then cannot be aced in this Shootout unless you lose by at least 2 ranks. Shootout Spirit 7: If this Spirit is successful, target one of your dudes in this Shootout who then cannot be aced in this Shootout unless you lose by at least 3 ranks.

name: Take Ya With Me
effect: Reaction: Play after Hands are revealed during a Shootout. The player who wins this round must also ace one dude, as if he had lost the round.

name: The 1st Bank is Robbed!
effect: Choose one deed in play. For this turn, that deed does not produce ghost rock for its owner, but instead has upkeep equal to its normal production.

name: The Amazing Xemo
effect: Mad Scientist:1Noon: Look at one random card in each of your opponent's hands.

name: Throw Down
effect: Noon: Boot one of your dudes to call out any dude at the same location that has a lower value. They begin a shootout that can't be refused.

name: Thunder Gulch Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Tioga Joe
effect: Tioga Joe cannot be aced in a Shootout unless your Hand is beaten by at least two ranks.

name: Total Eclipse
effect: Until nightfall two turns after this one, flushes are no longer a legal poker hand. (Straights and full houses are still two ranks apart). Ace this card.

name: Walkin' Dead
effect: Abomination. The Walkin' Dead may not move to strikes. Any dude in a posse with the Walkin' Dead becomes wanted. Card Memory does not apply to the Walkin' Dead.

name: War Paint
effect: Noon: One of your dudes has +2 Bullets until nightfall.

name: Water's Edge Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Weaponsmith
effect: Controller Noon: Boot one of your dudes at this location. One weapon carried by this dude has its Bullet Rating increased by +1 until the end of the game. Each weapon can only be modified once in this fashion.

name: Whiskey Nick
effect: Shootout: Nick gains a +1 Bullet Stud bonus when there is one or more Maze Rats in the opposing posse.

name: Wise Cloud
effect: Non-Unique. Shaman:2
